thread.title: Microsoft Now Displaying Full-Screen Windows 10 Upgrade Notifications on Windows 7
thread.title_full: Microsoft Now Displaying Full-Screen Windows 10 Upgrade Notifications on Windows 7 - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Microsoft Now Displaying Full-Screen Windows 10 Upgrade Notifications on Windows 7
text: Earlier this year, Microsoft has started showing Windows 10 upgrade notifications on Windows 7 computers in order to make sure that everyone was aware of the free offer that was available to those running a previous version of the operating system. But in the last few weeks, the company has become a little bit more aggressive with the Windows 10 upgrade and not only that it “accidentally” flagged it as important in Windows Update (which caused the new OS to be deployed auto... »
